name: Bioluminescence
description:
After a failed teleportation you end up in an unmapped cave system, and have to find your way back to the surface. However, you have no means of lighting up your path and have to rely on the bioluminescent properties of the alien plants around you.

Made for Weekly Game Jam #144 - In the Dark

All models self-made, sound effects from: https://www.zapsplat.com
